text: Boniface Ferdinand Leonard "Buddy" DeFranco (February 17, 1923 â€“ December 24, 2014) was an American jazz clarinet player. He was known for performing with the Chicago Symphony Orchestra. DeFranco died in Panama City, Florida at the age of 91.Jazz clarinetist great Buddy DeFranco dead at 91 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official biography *extensive Downbeat interview on his life and colleagues *IMDB Profile Category:1923 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American clarinetists Category:American jazz musicians Category:Musicians from New Jersey Category:Musicians from Chicago Category:People from Camden, New Jersey
